features: Pʀᴇᴍɪᴜᴍ Qᴜᴀʟɪᴛʏ: Aleva Naturals Baby Diapers are made with unbleached bamboo fibers on both top and bottom layers that contain Bamboo Kun to provide the best comfort for the most sensitive skin.

Cᴏᴍꜰᴏʀᴛᴀʙʟᴇ Bᴀʙʏ Dɪᴀᴘᴇʀ: Baby Diapers are ultra-soft, with a cloth-like feel to provide maximum comfort for your baby. With the extra absorbability and breathable layers, these diapers will keep your baby’s bottom soft, supple and silky smooth.
Unique Dᴇꜱɪɢɴ: Flexible side panels help to keep the diapers more secure on the baby's body. Double-up barriers protect where leaks happen most.
3 Lɪɴᴇ Wᴇᴛɴᴇꜱꜱ Iɴᴅɪᴄᴀᴛᴏʀ: These biodegradable diapers have a 3-line wetness indicator that changes from yellow to green, to alert parents when it is time for a change.
Cᴀʀᴇ Fᴏʀ Bᴀʙʏ: This Bamboo Baby diaper is specifically designed with babies in mind. This product is hypoallergenic, chlorine-free, latex-free, and free of harsh chemicals. Proudly Canadian.
body.description: 𝐀𝐥𝐞𝐯𝐚 𝐍𝐚𝐭𝐮𝐫𝐚𝐥𝐬 presents Bamboo Baby Diapers that are gentle and free of all harsh ingredients. These Bamboo Baby Diapers’ top and bottom layers are made from unbleached bamboo fibers that contain Bamboo Kun. Together with the extra absorbability and breathable layers, these diapers will help keep your baby’s bottom soft, supple and silky smooth. They have a 3-line wetness indicator that changes from yellow to green, to alert parents when it is time for a change. These baby diapers are specifically designed with babies in mind to alleviate moms' worry. Proudly Canadian.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Bamboo Baby Diapers, Size 2 Bamboo Baby Wipes, 80ct Bamboo Baby Sensitive Wipes, 72ct Soothing Diaper Cream Texture Ultra soft, cloth-like feel with an elastic stretch waistband and breathable back layer. Unbleached bamboo fibre with cross-weave technology that's ultra soft and extra strong. Unbleached bamboo fibre with cross-weave technology that's ultra soft and extra strong. Smooth, creamy, and non-greasy, also great for use on cloth diapers. Scent No artificial fragrance- any scent resulting from this product is attributed to its fibers and components. Mild scent from Chammomile and Lavender oils give off a pleasant scent. No artificial fragrance - any scent resulting from this product is attributed to its natural oils and ingredients. No artificial fragrance - any scent resulting from this product is attributed to its natural oils and ingredients. Benefits Chlorine, Dye, and Latex free with a wetness indicator. Specially formulated to soothe and cleanse on gentle, delicate skin, leaving it feeling silky-smooth. Perfume free to soothe and cleanse on delicate, sensitive skin, leaving it feeling silky-smooth. Provides a protective moisture barrier for soft, silky-smooth skin. Proudly Canadian ✓ ✓ ✓ Made in Canada

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 21, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Really Great Quality Diapers
reviews.reviewText: I loved these diapers for my 2 year old. They were super soft, super absorben and overall amazing quality (especially compared to the Pampers Swaddlers I used in the past). I only wish they made them in bigger sizes as my son is now over 30 pounds.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 16, 2019
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars High quality design
reviews.reviewText: Good Day everyone, specialy fathers. I just became one 11 days ago, we have a tiny (2,7 kg 48 cm) gorgeos baby, we have 0 complains about the diapers, in fact we find them very confortable, specially me,- They have the brand on the front so you dont miss the side, so it help you to do things right very quickly- they have a big frill so they cover around the legs of Emma to avoid spills, non so far- They ar very soft- they look like they will fit her for about 3 month or more, in other word they ar big but adaptable- they come in a very flat presentation en folded, so they fit in the diaperbagfor the price best choice, in my opinion, just wrap your baby with love a care, her or he will repay with normal numbers 1&2 hehe love you all

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 29, 2017
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Great coverage, soft and absorbent
reviews.reviewText: Great coverage, soft and absorbent. My only complaint is they run large. I had to wait a month to use them until my daughter got on the higher end of the size.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on April 29, 2016
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars I love these. They are too expensive for me to ...
reviews.reviewText: I love these. They are too expensive for me to use as my "everyday diaper," but I usually have a pack around and I'll use these diapers a couple times a day. They feel really soft and more absorbent, so I use them as an in between type diaper - not for daytime and not for overnight, but sometimes after it's been a little too long since the last diaper change and I want to comfort that little tush, or sometimes before going down for a nap. I wish all diapers were required to be biodegradable. Unlike our "everyday" diapers, these run true to size (for us.)

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on May 1, 2017
reviews.reviewText: This is my second pack I have purchased for our 8month old. She is rash prone and has very sensitive skin. The first pack we purchased were great, we didn't have any diaper explosions and she didn't get a rash and there weren't any leaks at night. The second pack we purchased either were made wrong or my daughter has a serious problem. She either leaked almost every single day we've used them or she had a major diaper explosion. This last diaper explosion was so bad it got all over her car seat, legs, arms and hair. This has never happened with any other diapers and I was completely surprised because we've used these before and we loved them. Long story short, I don't believe I'll go back to these anytime soon.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 5, 2017
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars great coverage. Great value for the high quality
reviews.reviewText: Soft with line to show wetness. No leakages, great coverage. Great value for the high quality.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 27, 2018
reviews.reviewText: Blowouts. Not very absorbent. It's a diaper, but not worth the $ for what you get.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 8, 2017
reviews.reviewText: Great diapers, love the transitional size from newborn to 1. Quality and thickness are awesome.

We’ve used these diapers for 18 months and have found the sizing was true to the weight specifications. They’re incredibly soft and we’re so comforted knowing how natural they are. If you find them pricey I’d suggest opting for the subscribe option. They may not be quite as durable as typical popular brands, but truthfully that brings me even more comfort knowing they’re not made of plastic and awful chemicals. We don’t experience leaks or blowouts at all! Love them and recommend them to everyone.

reviews.reviewTitle: Perfect--and Easy to Roll Down for a Newborn
reviews.reviewText: I love that eco-friendly disposable diapers are becoming more prevalent and affordable! These were the best price I could find and I'm totally satisfied. We never had any leakage.Our little one wore them for the first week or so during the meconium poo phase because cloth would be permanently damaged by the tar-like poop. He was comfortable and even though the diapers were a little big on his newborn bum, rolling down the front twice and securing firmly made them fit perfectly. I'd do it again! The price was a little bit much, but I think the environment is worth it--plus, I'm not buying these regularly (cloth was always the goal). Still--100% recommend!

These are the softest!!! I am so glad that I decided to purchase these. My only regret is not using them right from the beginning. At first I thought like others that they just looked way to big, comparing to other brands. I used the Huggies NB diapers the hospital supplied for the first few days because of this. His bum got a bad rash right away, as they hold his stool and voidings way to close to the bum. The Aleva diapers provide enough space so it is never really plastered to his skin, but sitting in the diaper below instead. When putting them on there is a slight learning curve as they do sit higher up at first then other diapers (My son is just over 7 lbs.). You also have to tighten them snuggly overlapping the velcro (Picture one). The inner elastic fits nicely preventing blow outs and leaks, even though the outer leg openings look large/loose (Picture two). I have had no problems, his bottom is now rash free and I will never use another diaper!

I received a sample from a friend with one newborn diaper in it and decided to try it on my daughter who is 2 months old. The diaper fit her so comfortably and I could not get over how soft it was so I immediately bought some. The quality is great as I have not had any of them leak and the fact that they are so soft I just know she is super comfortable!!
Nice quality diapers, only reason I didn’t give a 5 star is they’re not as absorbent for as long as other diapers. Great for day use, but cannot be on overnight. Re purchased them again though.
